title: RouteJs (ASP.NET 5 and MVC 6)
description: JavaScript URL routing for ASP.NET MVC. Allows you to use your ASP.NET MVC routes from JavaScript. Please refer to project site (http://dan.cx/projects/routejs) for more details, usage examples and sample code.
releaseNotes: Please refer to project site (http://dan.cx/projects/routejs) for more details, release notes, usage examples and sample code.
